item.title: Catppuccin
item.description: Catppuccin: My Favorite Colorscheme Catppuccin is a relatively new colorscheme. Released just about a year ago, Catppuccin has quickly grown to be one of the most popular colorschemes, up there with Gruvbox and Nord, my other two favorite colorschemes that I have used in the past. There are a few things that set Catppuccin apart from the rest, though. 1. It’s colorful. My two favorite colorschemes of all time are Nord and Catppuccin.
